# setFont(_:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the font used in the text field of the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
func setFont(_ font: NSFont!)
```

## Parameters

- **font**: The font to be used in the text field of the annotation.

## Managing Font and Font Color

- **font()**: Returns the font used for the annotation’s text field.
- **fontColor()**: Returns the font color used in the text field of the annotation.
- **setFontColor(_:)**: Sets the font color used in the text field of the annotation.
